item.title: Dbl Check - Relaunch
item.description:
Dbl Check Relaunch

Dbl Check is out (again)! It’s free on the Chrome Webstore with three “checks” a day for the time being. I got mixed up on how the Chrome Webstore works so I had to take it down, put it up, take it down again, etc.

I’ll work on some more features and increase the limit of three but I’m calling this the official launch.

https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/dbl-check/labkdeadaiekmeajaiknljnjpockolfj

item.title: Currently working a lot with my buddy Claude
item.description:
How fast, how stable, how useful

Really been enjoying working with Claude and, to my surprise, Grok. I have some issues with Gemini but I’m holding out hope (would love to work primarily with one tool but like Andrej Karpathy said, I need to consult the Council as it stands now).

Le Chat is blazingly fast but I need to put it through its paces a little more.
